page1.title: Revolutionize Your Digital Assets with the Power of AI
page1.slogan: {website.name} connects all your storage and lets AI handle search, transcription, tagging, and delivery - so your team can create faster, collaborate smoothly, and never miss a deadline.

cards.title: Submissions open for Godot 2025 showreel
cards.description: Showcase your Godot creations in 2025! We're inviting submissions of short videos featuring your published or in-progress Godot games or tools.

cards.title: Dev Snapshor Gadet 4.2
cards.description: Back to our regular schedule, the Godot 4.2 development snapshot is now available with numerous bug fixes and improvements.

cards.title: Gadot Founation announces new board members
cards.description: The Gadot Foundation is pleased to announce the appointment of new board members to support the Godot community.

page3.title: Built for Creative Teams Who Need More Than Just Storage
page3.description: From media companies managing petabytes of footage to marketing teams buried in creative files - {website.name} centralizes, organizes, and unlocks the value of your digital assets with advanced AI.

page4.title: What Teams Achieve with {website.name}
page4.description: Unlock the full potential of your digital assets – 50% faster than traditional solutions.

page6.title: You don't need to be an engine developer to help Godot. Join the development fund and help us make the Godot Engine even more awesome!

cards.title: Your AI That Understands Content, Not Just Stores It
cards.description: Chat with your digital library like you would with ChatGPT. ioPilot helps you find files, summarize content, and trigger tasks instantly - without relying on filenames or folder structure.

cards.title: Download US for Android and iOS
cards.description: Manage, access, and collaborate on your digital assets anytime, anywhere with the  mobile app. Stay connected and productive on the go.

cards.title: Built-In Intelligence for Images, Video, Audio, and Docs
cards.description: Go deeper than tags. ioAI understands what’s inside your content - images, videos, docs, and audio - and organizes it for you automatically.

cards.title: Your No-Code Workflow Engine
cards.description: Build drag-and-drop workflows that handle routing, approvals, notifications, and more, without any code or IT setup.”

cards.title: Native Integrations That Fit How You Already Work
cards.description: Access and interact with your digital assets inside the tools you use daily—no downloads or switching platforms required.

cards.title: Enterprise-Grade Security & Compliance
cards.description: Designed for organizations with strict data governance requirements, ioMoVo delivers a robust security infrastructure and compliance out of the box.

page8.title: {website.name} Transform How You Work With Your Digital Assets.
